title: More than Game Music: Making Warsongs

replies.body: Are we allowed to use this music as background music for YouTube videos or is it all under copyright? Wanted to check before I use it.

It's 100% whitelisted [according to Riot Wenceslaus](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/40xoyr/new_league_of_legends_music_album/cyxzsod), so you're free to use it in your videos. Good on you for checking, though!
can we put these songs into our league folders so its the normal music for league?

> [{quoted}](name=ElitePvp,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=YPEFfhEj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-15T00:09:43.015+0000)
>
> can we put these songs into our leauge folders so its the normal music for leage?

this is exactly what i thought when i read "Amp up your in-game plays by injecting new beats into classic League tunes."
Maybe they'll have the songs somewhere in the settings, so you can change it whenever you want?
is there a place where i can download it from?
I wanna put these song in my league music folders but i'm afraid i might Rek the sysyem...pls i need help and so do these songs {{item:3070}}
